00037 template <typename PAYLOAD>
00038 class time_ordered_list
00039 {
00040 public:
00041   struct element
00042   {
00043     struct element  *next;
00044     PAYLOAD p;
00045     sc_core::sc_time t;
00046     sc_dt::uint64 d;
00047     element(PAYLOAD& p, sc_core::sc_time t, sc_dt::uint64 d): p(p),t(t),d(d) {}
00048     element(){}
00049   };
00050 
00051   element *nill;
00052   element *empties;
00053   element *list;
00054   unsigned int size;
00055 
00056   time_ordered_list()
00057     : nill(new element()),
00058       empties(NULL),
00059       list(nill),
00060       size(0)
00061   {
00062   }
00063 
00064   ~time_ordered_list() {
00065     reset();
00066     while(empties){
00067       struct element *e=empties->next;
00068       delete empties;
00069       empties=e;
00070     }
00071     delete nill;
00072   }
00073 
00074   void reset() {
00075     while(size) {
00076       delete_top();
00077     }
00078   }
00079 
00080   void insert(const PAYLOAD& p, sc_core::sc_time t) {
00081     if (!empties) {
00082       empties=new struct element();
00083       empties->next=NULL;
00084     }
00085 
00086     struct element *e=empties;
00087     empties=empties->next;
00088     e->p=p;
00089     e->t=t;
00090     e->d=sc_core::sc_delta_count();
00091 
00092     struct element * ancestor=nill;
00093     struct element * iterator=list;
00094     while (iterator!=nill && iterator->t<=t){
00095       ancestor=iterator;
00096       iterator=iterator->next;
00097     }
00098     if (ancestor==nill){
00099       e->next=list;
00100       list=e;
00101     }
00102     else {
00103       e->next=iterator;
00104       ancestor->next=e;
00105     }
00106     size++;
00107   }
00108 
00109   void delete_top(){
00110     if (list != nill) {
00111       struct element *e=list;
00112       list=list->next;
00113       e->next=empties;
00114       empties=e;
00115       size--;
00116     }
00117   }
00118 
00119   unsigned int get_size()
00120   {
00121     return size;
00122   }
00123 
00124   PAYLOAD &top()
00125   {
00126     return list->p;
00127   }
00128   sc_core::sc_time top_time()
00129   {
00130     return list->t;
00131   }
00132 
00133   sc_dt::uint64& top_delta()
00134   {
00135     return list->d;
00136   }
00137 
00138   sc_core::sc_time next_time()
00139   {
00140     return list->next->t;
00141   }
00142 };
00143

00149 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00150 template<typename OWNER,typename TYPES=tlm::tlm_base_protocol_types>
00151 class peq_with_cb_and_phase:
00152   public sc_core::sc_object
00153 {
00154 
00155   typedef typename TYPES::tlm_payload_type tlm_payload_type;
00156   typedef typename TYPES::tlm_phase_type   tlm_phase_type;
00157   typedef std::pair<tlm_payload_type*, tlm_phase_type> PAYLOAD;
00158   typedef void (OWNER::*cb)(tlm_payload_type&, const tlm_phase_type&);
00159 
00160   class delta_list{
00161   public:
00162     delta_list(){
00163       reset();
00164       entries.resize(100);
00165     }
00166 
00167     inline void insert(const PAYLOAD& p){
00168       if (size==entries.size()){
00169         entries.resize(entries.size()*2);
00170       }
00171       entries[size++]=p;
00172     }
00173 
00174     inline PAYLOAD& get(){
00175       return entries[out++];
00176     }
00177 
00178     inline bool next(){
00179       return out<size;
00180     }
00181 
00182     inline void reset(){
00183       size=0;
00184       out=0;
00185     }
00186   public:
00187     unsigned int size;
00188   private:
00189     std::vector<PAYLOAD> entries;
00190     unsigned int out;
00191   };
00192 
00193 public:
00194 
00195   peq_with_cb_and_phase(OWNER* _owner, cb _cb)
00196     :sc_core::sc_object( sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name( "peq_with_cb_and_phase" ) )
00197     ,m_owner(_owner)
00198     ,m_cb(_cb)
00199   {
00200     sc_core::sc_spawn_options opts;
00201     opts.spawn_method();
00202     opts.set_sensitivity(&m_e);
00203     opts.dont_initialize();
00204     sc_core::sc_spawn(sc_bind(&peq_with_cb_and_phase::fec, this),
00205                       sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("fec"), &opts);
00206   }
00207 
00208   peq_with_cb_and_phase(const char* _name, OWNER* _owner,cb _cb)
00209     : sc_core::sc_object( _name )
00210     ,m_owner(_owner)
00211     ,m_cb(_cb)
00212   {
00213     sc_core::sc_spawn_options opts;
00214     opts.spawn_method();
00215     opts.set_sensitivity(&m_e);
00216     opts.dont_initialize();
00217     sc_core::sc_spawn(sc_bind(&peq_with_cb_and_phase::fec, this),
00218                       sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("fec"), &opts);
00219   }
00220 
00221   ~peq_with_cb_and_phase(){}
00222 
00223   void notify (tlm_payload_type& t, const tlm_phase_type& p, const sc_core::sc_time& when){
00224     //t.aquire();
00225     if (when==sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME) {
00226       if (sc_core::sc_delta_count() & (sc_dt::uint64)0x1) //uneven delta cycle so delta delay is for even cylce
00227         m_even_delta.insert(PAYLOAD(&t,p));
00228       else
00229         m_uneven_delta.insert(PAYLOAD(&t,p)); //even delta cycle so delta delay is for uneven delta
00230       m_e.notify(sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME);
00231     }
00232     else {
00233       m_ppq.insert(PAYLOAD(&t,p),  when + sc_core::sc_time_stamp() );
00234       m_e.notify(when); // note, this will only over-right the "newest" event.
00235     }
00236   }
00237 
00238   void notify (tlm_payload_type& t, const tlm_phase_type& p){
00239     m_immediate_yield.insert(PAYLOAD(&t,p));
00240     m_e.notify(); // immediate notification
00241   }
00242 
00243   // Cancel all events from the event queue
00244   void cancel_all() {
00245     m_ppq.reset();
00246     m_uneven_delta.reset();
00247     m_even_delta.reset();
00248     m_immediate_yield.reset();
00249     m_e.cancel();
00250   }
00251 
00252 private:
00253 
00254   void fec(){
00255     //immediate yield notifications
00256     while(m_immediate_yield.next()) {PAYLOAD& tmp=m_immediate_yield.get(); (m_owner->*m_cb)(*tmp.first, tmp.second);} //tmp.first->release();}
00257     m_immediate_yield.reset();
00258 
00259     //delta notifications
00260     if (sc_core::sc_delta_count() & (sc_dt::uint64) 0x1) {//uneven delta so put out all payloads for uneven delta
00261       while (m_uneven_delta.next()) {PAYLOAD& tmp=m_uneven_delta.get(); (m_owner->*m_cb)(*tmp.first, tmp.second);} //tmp.first->release();}
00262       m_uneven_delta.reset();
00263       if (m_even_delta.size) m_e.notify(sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME);
00264     }
00265     else {
00266       while (m_even_delta.next()) {PAYLOAD& tmp=m_even_delta.get(); (m_owner->*m_cb)(*tmp.first, tmp.second);} //tmp.first->release();}
00267       m_even_delta.reset();
00268       if (m_uneven_delta.size) m_e.notify(sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME);
00269     }
00270     if (!m_ppq.get_size()) return; //there were only delta notification
00271 
00272     //timed notifications
00273     const sc_core::sc_time now=sc_core::sc_time_stamp();
00274     sc_core::sc_time top=m_ppq.top_time();
00275 
00276     while(m_ppq.get_size() && top==now) { // push all active ones into target
00277       PAYLOAD& tmp=m_ppq.top();
00278       (m_owner->*m_cb)(*tmp.first, tmp.second); //tmp.first->release();}
00279       m_ppq.delete_top();
00280       top=m_ppq.top_time();
00281     }
00282     if ( m_ppq.get_size()) {
00283       m_e.notify( top - now) ;
00284     }
00285 
00286   }
00287 
00288   OWNER* m_owner;
00289   cb     m_cb;
00290 
00291   time_ordered_list<PAYLOAD> m_ppq;
00292   delta_list m_uneven_delta;
00293   delta_list m_even_delta;
00294   delta_list m_immediate_yield;
00295 
00296   sc_core::sc_event m_e;   // default event
00297 };
00298 
00299 }
